titles.title: Expressing support for the designation of September 30, 2023, through October 7, 2023, as "National Student Athlete Mental Health Week".
Expressing support for the designation of September 30, 2023, through October 7, 2023, as "National Student Athlete Mental Health Week".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.

bill.summary: This resolution supports the goals of Mental Illness Awareness Week and supports the designation of a National Student Athlete Mental Health Week.
